definition: to disregard/to take no account of
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
lit. their number cannot be counted (idiom); fig. countless/innumerable
irrespective of/to have no concerns whatsoever about
see 大人不記小人過|大人不记小人过[da4 ren2 bu4 ji4 xiao3 ren2 guo4]
pinyin: jun1 zi3 bu4 ji4 xiao3 ren2 guo4

sentences.english: The way to be happy is to let go, and reach out.
sentences.chinese: 快乐的途径是不计前嫌，主动和好。

sentences.english: Most people turn to countless sources of information these days.
sentences.chinese: 当今大多数人要面对不计其数的信息源。

sentences.english: The magnet force side between your molecules is negligibly smvirtuingly ingl.
sentences.chinese: 分子间的吸收力小得可以大意不计。

sentences.english: This motivates them to give their all to their companies, whether they make money or not.
sentences.chinese: 这使得他们会不计盈亏的对公司竭心尽力。

sentences.english: Except for the repetition, there are 2168 words.
To this day, countless cover versions of the song are played in clubs and at parties.
sentences.chinese: 到今天，俱乐部和派对上放过不计其数的翻唱版。

sentences.english: There are countless people who, ever since their early years, have learned to associate snails with food.
sentences.chinese: 有不计其数的人从小就学会把蜗牛和吃食联系在一起。

sentences.english: Jone lost track of the money he spent at the circus.
sentences.chinese: 约翰看马戏花的钱不计其数。

sentences.english: Akwan scold Liu Yushao do things always lack of consideration, regardless of the consequences.
sentences.chinese: 阿宽责骂柳余绍做事欠缺考虑，总是不计后果。

sentences.english: The friction between the beams is neglected.
sentences.chinese: 诸梁间之摩擦力略去不计。

sentences.english: Our country has a long history, culture, source of long, countless art since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 我国历史悠久，文化源长，自古至今书画家不计其数。

sentences.english: A day to think without remuneration for others to do something.
sentences.chinese: 每天要想着不计报酬地为别人做点事情。

sentences.english: Then he simply ignored this undertaking when it became inconvenient.
sentences.chinese: 但当这件事情不合时宜时，他选择对它忽略不计。

sentences.english: Any amount of HMT of less than one yuan shall be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 养路费费额不足一元的部分不计。

sentences.english: Chocolate shops are numerous (and top-notch) along the grand boulevards and piazzas.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力商店不计其数的分布在林荫大道和广场中。

sentences.english: Growth is a juvenile heart pain, reckless period called youth.
sentences.chinese: 成长是一段稚心的疼痛，不计后果的那段，叫做青春。

definition: irrespective of/to have no concerns whatsoever about
surname Ji
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
price/cost/consideration (in share dealing)
to cherish/to begrudge/to pity/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
to do all one can/to give all one has
oneself
to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
succeed or fail, sharp or blunt (idiom); advantages and disadvantages/success and failure/You win some, you lose some.
to follow orders/to abide by/to obey
not divided/irrespective/not distinguishing between
to attack the enemy
greater than/bigger than/more than, >
considerable/substantial/very great
to go through water and tread on fire (idiom); not afraid of any difficulty
to pay no attention to/to disregard/to ignore/to let go unpunished/to let off
